title: Dragons Live Forever
description: Tahr, the silver dragon, is the last to find a forever mate and break the curse.He descends from the mighty line of royal silver dragons. His uncle Drakon’s actions caused the curse that has been the center of pain and suffering for the remaining dragons for thousands of years.Pepper is a mute human brought to the dragon realm as a child. Tahr’s previous bride befriended Pepper and taught her many things that most human servants in the dragon realm never experience. Pepper has a dream. She wants nothing more than to be a dragon—craves it desperately.When Pepper is caught sneaking into Tahr’s bed chamber and placing her hand on his chest, the consequences are deadly.How does one small human tame a dragon when he sees her only as a possession? She lives by human years which is a blink in the eye of a dragon.Can Pepper overcome the curse and change destiny or will Tahr suffer always because Dragons Live Forever?Enter the steamy world of Fire Chronicles. Series Complete.
author: D'Elen McClain
